com.accele.gage

Interface ResourceLoader<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of data this ResourceLoader will retrieve

    public interface ResourceLoader<T>
    Represents a way to retrieve data for a particular Resource. For specific resource loaders predefined by GAGE, see the ResourceLoaders class.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    William Garland
    See Also:
    ResourceLoaders

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T load(ResourceLocation src, java.lang.Object[] additionalArgs)
      Loads the data contained at the specified ResourceLocation using any necessary additional arguments.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        T load(ResourceLocation src,
       java.lang.Object[] additionalArgs)
throws GAGEException
        Loads the data contained at the specified ResourceLocation using any necessary additional arguments. This method will throw a GAGEException if the loader fails to retrieve the data.
        Parameters:
        src - the ResourceLocation of the data
        additionalArgs - any additional arguments required by the loader
        Returns:
        the data retrieved by the loader
        Throws:
        GAGEException - if the loader fails to retrieve the data
